info.task: navigate to previous row in grid
info.title: Navigate to the previous row in a grid in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSixthDataCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first cell of the third row in the grid

user: Navigate to the previous row in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the previous row in the grid.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
